FuncDef: The clock ssm-control command configures whether SSM levels participate in clock source selection. The clock ssm-control command configures whether SSM levels participate in clock source selection. By default, SSM levels do not participate in clock source selection. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H-48S6CQ, CE6881H-48S6CQ-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that SSM levels participate in clock source selection.
-

Indicates that SSM levels do not participate in clock source selection.
-
